title: CB sells bonds, bank lending decreases

content.question: Assume a countryâ€™s banking system has limited reserves. If the central bank sells a significant amount of government securities in the open market, which of the following will occur?

choices.label: The total amount of loans made by commercial banks will decrease.
The total amount of loans made by commercial banks will increase.
Rates of interest and amount of loans made by commercial banks will remain unchanged.

content.answer: The total amount of loans made by commercial banks will decrease.
